content.p:
ยง 2573. Children's institutions; inspections; reports. 1. The
administrative officer or person in charge and the regular physician of
every institution caring for children referred to in this article shall
make such reports concerning the physical condition and health of the
children and the environmental sanitation of the institution as may be
required by the state health commissioner, local health officer or
health commissioner having jurisdiction.
 2. In conjunction with the state department having general
supervision, the commissioner may make inspection of such institutions
from time to time with respect to the physical health and condition of
the children and the environmental sanitation of the institution or he
may direct that such inspections be made by the health officer having
jurisdiction.
